reviewText: So enjoying my purchase and the information.
These DVD's are great for one who wants to walk in the things of God and have a life changes experience. Listen with  your heart and not your human nature

I bought it for my husband for Christmas and he loved it! The DVD quality isn't the greatest, but you have to remember that they are using very old sound and video clips on some things. It's a very informative DVD set for anyone wanting to learn about the Godly men and women who went on before us. I recommend!
Great Mother's Day gift to myself, It is a powerful and anointed series collection on Faith. It definitely is a collection worth putting in your library!

This set of God's Generals will change your life and walk with God.
By honoring the past generation and what they did for us enables
use to flow in their anointings and avoid their mistakes. This helps
us to keep our hearts on the King and His Kingdom.

This is an outstanding set of DVD's! They are well worth the money! Not only do we get teaching on some of the great people who have been mightily used of God but we also get some very sound advice and teaching form Roberts Liardon. My wife and I have been blessed and inspired by hearing about these people. Roberts Liardon has brought us to tears with his encouraging words to press into God and glorify His name!

If you want to understand the heart of God shinning through, these DVD's will really bless you. There is rare footage and unique information that brings to life the God intent with each ministry. Spend time in prayer and let God bless you. This is not as much entertainment as edifcation, however, they are well done.

These documentaries are well worth your time.  I feel that Robert Lairdon did an exceptional job digging up what he could of those people that set a standard before us like Paul and his apostles.  It is amazing to watch some of these clips from their healing ministries or revivals from the 50's and 60's and even before.

I have been very happy with this set of dvds concerning the revivalists.  Roberts Lairdon has included home movies of Smith Wigglesworth, Aimee Simple McPherson, etc.  Some of this information would be lost if it were not for these dvds.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone.

well, i was dissapointed to say the least. i was expecting a high quality documentary. i have been waiting forever to get documentaries on these heroes of our faith, but i was disappointed when i got the dvds. all it is, is Roberts Liardon standing there talking. the entire time. just him, poor quality.

but it did have some good info. which gives it 2 stars.
